Some Nifty Demo

01 Dec 2007

Not yet a tutorial (coming soon...) but here is a simple demo (Java 1.5 webstart)</a> of nifty gui. It demonstrates a lot of nifty blen</a>d in, blend out, move in, move out stuff and some advanced hover effects. It demonstrates how you could use nifty for a simple game gui. Simple but with lots of style =)

Please keep in mind that this is just a demo for nifty and no game ;)

Start the demo (Java 1.5 webstart)</a>

And just in case you are curious:

Here ist the XML that drives all the stuff in the demo</a>
